text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haaa-ha-ha-ha! I've done it again in spectacular style!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes! I feel like I want to turn a somersault and cry all at once! This is truly a Bakushin-level of pain!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hm? Wait, then maybe that means, if I Bakushin under these conditions……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I think I'll be able to Bakushin even more!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This crisis is, in fact, an opportunity! My chance to grow as class president has arrived!
choice_data_list: As class president, you should rest!
……Want to take a bet on that chance?
……Want to take a bet on that chance?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This crisis is, in fact, an opportunity! My chance to grow as class president has arrived!
choice_data_list: As class president, you should rest!
……Want to take a bet on that chance?
……Want to take a bet on that chance?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Eh!? ……Wh, what do you mean!?
choice_data_list: Everyone's going to be worried about you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What you're saying is… I should show everyone in my class……how I became a huge worrywart……?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: U… uuugh… I, it hurts…
choice_data_list: I knew the pain of the injury was…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Sniff……No, that's not it…… The pain… is in my heart!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm… I'm crying because I'm so…… unworthy, my heart hurts!
Sakura Bakushin O was very sorry and tried to recuperate……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I do, let's take a chance!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hm? Bet on it? Bet on it…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Stoooooop!! No bet, no bet! No betting-on-it now!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That was a close call! I was about to do something bad, betting on something!
choice_data_list: No, it's a figure of speech…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No! I am the ever well-behaved class president! Now that you've noticed my almost-foul deed, you'll have to crack down on me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: B, but… maybe, technically, I can consider it just a tiiiny bit of a social study of sorts――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――Wait, nononononono, no! If I do that, I can't Bakushin down the elite road!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wake up! Sakura Bakushin Ooooo!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hah… Haah… All of the sudden… I'm kind of… tired……
Maybe it was the strenuous effort of her constantly trying to be class president that had tired her out… But her injury wasn't healing well either.
She said she'd start with some stretches to see how her body felt.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hooooow's that! This supple movement! It's more polished than before, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Of course it is, of course it is! I knew my theory was correct!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you sincerely, Trainer! For believing in me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Watch this! The power of the New and Improved Class President, who overcame injury and… evolved even further!
The "New and Improved Class President" was so powerful that she resumed her training soon after!
